thread.title: Performance Bicycle hosts nationwide bike ride in honor of Breast Cancer Awareness Month

author: cbs8
title: Performance Bicycle hosts nationwide bike ride in honor of Breast Cancer Awareness Month
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE Performance Bicycle
"A Great Ride For A Great Cause" bike ride, bracelet sales with matching donation in support of the American Cancer Society
CHAPEL HILL, N.C. , Oct. 6, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Performance Bicycle, the No. 1 choice for people who love to ride, is hosting "A Great Ride For A Great Cause" nationwide bike ride on Saturday, Oct. 24, 2015 at all Performance Bicycle locations in support of the American Cancer Society. "A Great Ride For A Great Cause" is part of Performance Bicycle's Great Ride Series .
"A Great Ride For A Great Cause" rides will last approximately one hour and will go at a comfortable 12 to 15 miles per hour pace. All rides are "No Rider Left Behind" and perfect for new and experienced cyclists. Store locations can be found at PerformanceBike.com/Stores .
Beginning Tuesday, October 13 , Performance Bicycle customers can purchase bracelets for $3 in support of Breast Cancer Awareness at all Performance Bicycle locations . Performance Bicycle will match all bracelet sales from October 13 through October 24 , up to $9,000 across stores nationwide . All bracelet sales and matching funds will go directly to the American Cancer Society.
"Performance Bicycle is committed to helping the American Cancer Society continue its efforts to prevent, detect, and treat the disease, and improve the quality of life of breast cancer patients and survivors," said Performance Bicycle Chief Executive Officer David Pruitt . "I encourage all cyclists, their friends and families to not only purchase bracelets, but to also come on this ride with us and show their support for Breast Cancer Awareness Month."
Riders participating in "A Great Ride For A Great Cause" are encouraged to post photos of their ride with the hashtag #greatridegreatcause on Twitter, Facebook and Instagram. Cyclists can also follow Performance Bicycle on Twitter, Facebook, YouTube and Instagram at twitter.com/performancebike , facebook.com/performancebike , youtube.com/performancebike and instagram.com/performancebike .
About Performance Bicycle®
Performance Bicycle® is the No. 1 specialty bicycle retailer in the U.S. and is a wholly owned subsidiary of Performance Inc. Performance provides an omni-channel cycling experience that spans more than 100 stores nationwide , and www.PerformanceBike.com , catering to both the avid cycling enthusiast and the recreational rider. Performance Inc. is majority owned by North Castle Partners of Greenwich, Conn. For more information about Performance Bicycle, please visit www.PerformanceBike.com .
